Package arcade.patch.env.location

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Coordinate
    Representation of a coordinate.
    CoordinateUVWZ
    Representation of (u, v, w, z) coordinate.
    CoordinateXYZ
    Representation of (x, y, z) coordinates.
    PatchLocation
    Abstract implementation of Location for patch models.
    PatchLocationContainer
    Implementation of LocationContainer for PatchLocation objects.
    PatchLocationFactory
    Implementation of LocationFactory for PatchLocation objects.
    PatchLocationFactoryHex
    Concrete implementation of PatchLocationFactory for hexagonal geometry.
    PatchLocationFactoryRect
    Concrete implementation of PatchLocationFactory for rectangular geometry.
    PatchLocationHex
    Concrete implementation of PatchLocation for hexagonal Grid to a triangular Lattice.
    PatchLocationRect
    Concrete implementation of PatchLocation for rectangular Grid to a rectangular Lattice.
